name: Word Search2 Quiz | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: An expression of greeting is found in Shakespeare's 'Othello'?
questions.explanation:
Hello & hello.

	otHELLO. Hello and welcome to the quiz.

questions.text: Attempt 'Poetry in Motion'?
Roy Orbison is called a buffalo?
Can this wildebeest be found in the constellation Cygnus?
What the choir did in Los Angeles?
Loose material consisting of rock and mineral grains lead to 'Needles and Pins'?
Messengers visit this German city?
questions.explanation:
Essen & essen.

	mESSENgers. Essen is the leading industrial centre of the Ruhr.

questions.text: 'Eleanor Rigby' is neither fat nor plump?
'Mary Had A Little Lamb' who saw this Spanish Surrealist painter?
questions.explanation:
Dali & dali.

	haD A LIttle. Salvador Dali

questions.text: Recklessly setting fire to another's property will lead to 'Tears On My Pillow'?
'The Good, The Bad and the Ugly' lead us to the self of an individual person?
Is the largest island of Greece made of concrete and clay?
'The Young Ones' are all spent, consumed and used up?
My soulmate is found in this industrial city in Germany on the river Danube?
The Lord's Prayer gives us fine particles of a liquid?
Doppelganger, a ghostly duplicate of a living person and a 'Beautiful Stranger' causes a feeling of great annoyance.
questions.explanation:
Anger & anger.

	doppelgANGER and beautiful strANGER.

questions.text: This country of North Africa is 'Much Ado about Nothing'?
Violate this perennial herbaceous plant if you dare?
A sign of future happiness or disaster is found in Gilbert and Sullivan's 'The Yeomen of the Guard'?
'It's Now or Never' to be exhausted or spent?
Being tranquil and serene, 'The Magical Mystery Tour' is almost without motion?
In the Islamic world, Smokey Robinson and the Miracles can be an independent ruler or chieftain?
'Walking Back to Happiness' is my great feeling of longing, my desire?
In the Old Testament, Jacob's sixth son is at the Gettysburg Address?
'Those Were The Days' in medieval England when a servant of high rank was in charge of the serving of meals and the seating of guests?
questions.explanation:
Sewer & sewer.

	thoSE WERe the days. I hope the stinker of a question at the end didn't spoil your enjoyment of the quiz.
